long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Game Features
"Japanese Suika Game" offers the following features:

Japanese Food Theme: The game features Japanese delicacies as its theme. You will encounter matcha tea, sushi, mochi, octopus, and other tempting Japanese specialties.

Merging Gameplay: The game involves merging identical foods to create larger and more valuable dishes. When identical foods touch, they merge into a larger dish. You can continue merging to create increasingly precious culinary delights.

Food Merging Chain: By merging 11 foods in a row, you can create a delicious bowl of ramen. Look for opportunities to merge and build long chains to obtain higher-value dishes.

Challenge Levels: The game offers multiplechallenge levels, each with specific goals and constraints. You need to strategically merge foods to meet the level requirements and earn a high score.

Japanese-style Interface: The game features a Japanese-style interface and graphic design, creating an immersive ambiance of Japanese culture. You will experience a unique Japanese aesthetic throughout the game.
